GauranlenTreeModeDef.label: royal dryad
GauranlenTreeModeDef.description: The dryad caste is universal. They can play both a defensive role and an aggressive one, providing significant support in combat.

GauranlenTreeModeDef.label: abyss wolf dryad
GauranlenTreeModeDef.description: A dryad caste specialized in aggression and damage-dealing attacks. They are not very durable in close combat, but their attacks are deadly to opponents without resistance to toxins.
